snippet.title: RPG Astral Frontier - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Change your fate in a world to the brink of extinction!
A space fantasy RPG Astral Frontier is now available for Android!

Google Play
[Premium]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.wws.afapremium&hl=en
[Freemium]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.wws.afa&hl=en

A polluted world where environmental degradation has pushed humanity to the brink of extinction. Orion has no choice but to accept an arranged marriage in the hope that it will save his endangered village. But just as he begins to accept his fate, a chance encounter... This seemingly insignificant encounter alters our hero's fate and leads to massive changes that ultimately impact the entire world...

©2016 WorldWideSoftware published by KEMCO
※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
